name: Cia de Saneamento do Distrito Federal
description: Cia de Saneamento do Distrito Federal (CAESB) is a prominent Brazilian company focused on providing water supply and sewage services in the Federal District and surrounding regions. Established in 1969, CAESB has grown to become a leader in sanitation management, playing a crucial role in ensuring access to clean water and effective waste management for millions of residents. The company is committed to sustainability and innovation, adopting advanced technologies to enhance its water treatment processes and sewage management systems. CAESB's initiatives include investments in infrastructure to expand service coverage and improve the quality of existing services. The company also engages in environmental preservation efforts, promoting responsible water use and conservation among its customers. With a mission to guarantee quality water and efficient sewage services, CAESB is pivotal in contributing to public health and environmental sustainability in the regions it serves.

seo.meta_title: Cia de Saneamento do Distrito Federal | Water and Sewage Services
seo.meta_description: Explore CAESB, a leader in providing water supply and sewage services in Brazil's Federal District. Learn about their commitment to sustainability and public health.

faq.question: What services does CAESB provide?
faq.answer: CAESB provides water supply and sewage services in the Federal District of Brazil.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of CAESB?
faq.answer: Joaquim de Oliveira is the CEO of CAESB.

faq.question: Where is CAESB headquartered?
faq.answer: CAESB is headquartered in Brasília, Brazil.
